channel.title: Upcoming OECD Publication Embargoes and Launches
channel.description: A list of dates and publications

item.title: Pharmaceutical Innovation and Access to Medicines
item.description: Pharmaceutical Innovation and Access to Medicines by Directorate for Employment, Labour and Social Affairs has an embargo on Thursday 29 November 2018 at 11:00 and a launch event planned on Thursday 29 November 2018 at 11:00.
